comment: /**  * The resolver to use to locate the location  */
code: /**  * The resolver to use to locate the location  */ public void setResolver(String resolver) {     this.resolver = resolver. }
/**  * Property locations to use.  */ public void setPath(String path) {     this.path = path. }
/**  * If the location is optional.  */ public void setOptional(Boolean optional) {     this.optional = optional. }

@Override public String toString() {     String answer = path.     if (ObjectHelper.isNotEmpty(resolver)) {         answer = resolver + ":" + answer.     }     if (ObjectHelper.isNotEmpty(optional)) {         answer = answer + ".optional=true".     }     return answer. }
public PropertiesLocation toLocation() {     return new PropertiesLocation(resolver != null ? resolver : "classpath", path, optional != null ? optional : false). }
